thread.section_title: The Gallivant Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday surprise
thread.title_full: Birthday surprise - Review of The Gallivant Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JulesO1954
title: Birthday surprise
text:
My niece had booked this hotel for my sister (her mother) and me to stay in on a surprise break for her 60th birthday. We found the rooms adequate for our needs and the hotels location was great. We managed to walk everywhere we wanted to go, apart from using the tour bus.
The concierge (lovely lady) booked us a show to see and also arranged our transport back to JFK.
The snow storm never stopped us getting about just delayed our departure for 20 hours.
this hotel is so central, its is so close to Times Square, Central Park is a short walk away and beautiful in the snow..
hopefully we can return again and would book the same hotel.
